items.content_html: Ventilated top panel for flexy cube. All cube panels are 10x10cm, with a 1mm corner radius, and four 3mm holes centred 5mm from the edges. Can be combined with Totem boards and Makerbeam.

items.content_html:
Alan Jacobs in Breaking Bread with the Dead, p65:

Plutarch thought that one could live a wise and fulfilling life anywhere, and that was possible in part because of books – books that connect us to the Great.
items.content_text:
Alan Jacobs in [Breaking Bread with the Dead](https://micro.blog/books/9781788162999), p65:

> Plutarch thought that one could live a wise and fulfilling life anywhere, and that was possible in part because of books – books that connect us to the Great.
